title: Number of homicides by firearm in the U.S. 2006 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of homicides, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2012 to 2006.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2014.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2014 to 2012.
gold: The statistic shows the number of homicides by firearm in the United States from 2006 to 2018 . In 2018 , about 11,006 homicides in the United States were committed by firearm .
